title: Wake Up, Jeff
story: Wake up, Jeff. It's time for school. Aw... mom. I'm still sleepy. I'm sorry, dear, but you'll miss your bus. Okay, mom. I'm up. Good job. Come and eat your cereal. Okay, mom. Here comes the school bus. I'm ready, mom. See you later.
summary: A young boy struggles to wake up for school but eventually gets ready just in time for the bus.
image: An illustration of a young boy in bed with his mother standing next to him, trying to wake him up.
